  • MediaTek Kompanio 520 and Kompanio 528 overview: promising amped-up performance and advanced multimedia capabilities for entry-level Chromebooks
    MediaTek Kompanio 520 and Kompanio 528 are ideal for entry-level devices without compromising on any aspect, and will be commercially available by the first half of 2023.
  • MediaTek Pentonic 1000 overview: a flagship SoC for 4K TVs that comes with integrated MEMC
    MediaTek Pentonic 1000 chip can power 4K 120Hz HDR displays and up to 4K 144Hz VRR for gaming monitors. Here's why you should look forward to TVs powered by it.
  • MediaTek Dimensity 9200 paves way for next-gen flagships offering incredible performance with impressive power savings, ray tracing, upgraded AI, and more
    The world's first chipset with the ARM Cortex-X3, Immortalis-G715 GPU, LPDDR5X memory, and Wi-Fi 7 support - MediaTek Dimensity 9200 will power next-gen flagships
